activity_name: Develop prototype and import it to Test Environment

substeps.description: Design and code prototype based on requirements

activity_name: Test and correct version to import it in Staging Environment

substeps.description: Conduct initial testing in Test Environment
Identify and fix any issues or bugs
Import corrected version into Staging Environment

activity_name: Test and adjust with the feedback of the ticket owner and users

substeps.description: Gather feedback from ticket owner and users
Implement adjustments and retest in Staging Environment

activity_name: Import version with new functionality in Production Environment

substeps.description: Prepare deployment plan for Production Environment
Execute deployment of new version to Production
Verify successful implementation in Production Environment

activity_name: Communicate new version and adjust with feedback of the ticket owner

substeps.description: Notify ticket owner of new version deployment
Collect and review feedback from ticket owner
Make final adjustments based on feedback if necessary

activity_name: Close ticket by deliberated new functionality and update KMS

substeps.description: Update Knowledge Management System (KMS) with new information
Close the development ticket in the system
